snippet.title: The Lord of Hexa : Cozy city builder | Teaser
snippet.description:
Get it on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.NahueCabrol.LordOfHexa
You are a medieval Lord who must construct a colony, complete challenges, and rule an hexagonal low poly world. 👑

⚓ - Utilize your ship to transport materials between islands.
🤝 - Trade with your friends in the online marketplace, where players set prices.
⛏️ - Build a mine to get stones and metal.
🐄 - Tame animals for your farm.
🐟 - And don't forget ice fishing!

Immerse yourself in a tranquil ambiance with soothing sounds and music in this minimalistic tile game! 

Unlock Google Play Games achievements! The first place in the leaderboard is waiting for you. 🎮 

Follow me!
https://twitter.com/NahueCabrol

#gamedev #indiegame #mobilegame #godot
